display_long_description:
This is a immersive and terrifying VR game that puts you in the middle of a city overrun by zombies. As the player, you must survive, use weapons and ammunition wisely, and avoid contact with the undead to make your way to safety. 
Each part presents a new challenge and requires quick reflexes and strategic planning to succeed. 

Can you outsmart the zombies and escape the city before it's too late? Play on Oculus Quest and find out if you have what it takes to survive the zombie apocalypse in virtual reality. Can you make it out alive?

With hordes of HUNDREDS of zombies attacking you at the same time, you'll need to stay on your toes and use every weapon at your disposal to stay alive!. Take on the challenge and see how long you can survive in this thrilling and heart-pumping adventure! Do you have what it takes to survive the undead onslaught?

* This game is in Early Access and More and more updates coming. Enjoy and support us while we improve it !
